name: Light Planes
description:
Install instructions

Hello! Thank you for trying Light Planes.

This game is still in it's extremely early stages. The purpose of this build is for playtesting the core concept of the game.

Installation should be simply running the exe.

If you run into any issues or bugs, please leave them as a comment here:

https://itch.io/t/30643/bug-reports

I will try to get to them as soon as possible. Most of the time, restarting the game will resolve issues with losing connection or respawn failing.

If you have feature ideas or feedback, please post here:

https://itch.io/t/30644/feedback-feature-requests

Thanks again for trying the game, look forward to the feedback.

Claite

Twitch - https://www.twitch.tv/claite

Twitter - @ClaiteTV
